heading: Today
text: Partly then mostly cloudy, and cold, with highs in the single digits to near 10 in the north, mid teens to lower 20s in the south. North wind 5 to 15 mph, diminishing in the afternoon.

heading: Tonight
text: Partly to mostly cloudy, with a chance of snow showers developing south and west of I-89, spreading north and east after midnight. Lows in the single digits north, increasing into the teens south. Light wind.

heading: Saturday
text: Cloudy. Chance of light scattered snow showers, diminishing from north to south. Highs from the teens to low 20s north, mid to upper 20s in the south. Light wind.
